QuestData.Title: Flower Power
QuestData.Description: You know how to use the spitters, but did you know that if you use a sunflower you can grow things faster? We'll grow some sunflowers and then we'll plant some spitters to push back Warden Stillwater's crazed monstrosities.$B$BLet's go!
QuestData.LogDescription: Survive a Massive Wave of Zombies.
QuestData.RewardText: I think that was just the start of it, $g bud:lady;! MORE INCOMING!
